text:
Sale of Hazardous Goods Order 2000

The Products Safety Committee makes the following order under section 8 of the Sale of Hazardous Goods Act 1977 .

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Sale of Hazardous Goods Order 2000 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Prohibition on sale of certain candles and candle wicks
    A person must not sell â€“
            (a) any candle with a wick that contains more than 0.06% lead by weight; or
            (b) any candle wick that contains more than 0.06% lead by weight.

4.

This order was made by the Products Safety Committee at a meeting held on 7 October 1999.

R. Ormerod

Chairperson

A. Pittas

Member

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 12 April 2000

This order is administered in the Department of Justice and Industrial Relations.
